Class Normal

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Point, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Normal
extends NativeObject
implements Point, java.lang.Cloneable
    A point structure representing normal coordinates and the surface curvature estimate.
